settings.terms_text: I accept the privacy policy

settings.question: How Long Does My Order Take To Ship?
settings.answer:
Shipping Times May Vary Depending on Your Location for Small Parcel Items Usually 1 - 3 Business Days, Large Items (on Skids/pallets) Usually 2 - 4 Business Days.

For orders outside of Ontario please call or email us for a more accurate lead time

settings.question: How Can I Contact You?
settings.answer: The Best Way to Reach Us is by Emailsales@plumbingmarket.caas the Phones Can Get Busy at Times Our Number is289-236-2378

settings.question: What Is Your Return Policy?
settings.answer:
We Keep an Open and Clear Policy When It Comes to Returns or Exchanges, All Items Must Be Inspected on Arrival to Your Job Site or Home and All Claims Must Be Submitted Within 7 Days of Receipt.

PleaseClick Hereto Read More About Our Return Policy (Some Items Such as Custom Order Items Are Not Eligible for Return or Exchange). Pleasesee herefor our full return policy and guidance

settings.question: Contractor, Designer, Large Project?
settings.answer: If you answer yes to the above please contact us at 289-236-2378 or email us sales@plumbingmarket.ca we would love to help you find the products you need at unbeatable prices
